imdb.title: Kengan Ashura
imdb.plot: A timid old man is summoned by his chairman to become the manager of Tokita Ohma, a highly skilled gladiator who only cares about fighting and winning in the Kengan matches.

episodes.title: Convictions
episodes.plot: Kiohzan Takeru looks like he's using MMA moves against "Hell's Angel" Jun Sekibayashi, but his all-out style is how sumo was originally fought.

episodes.title: Master and Pupil
episodes.plot: Gladiators and spectators enjoy a night off. Ohma visualizes his matches against formidable opponents -- including his former master, Niko Tokita.

episodes.title: The Fisherman
episodes.plot: Ajiro Fisheries' Yoshinari Karo faces Saw Paing Yoroizuka. The match is rigged however Karo and his harpoon aren't following the script.

episodes.title: The Rakshasa
episodes.plot: Destinyland's Masami Nezu takes on Rei Mikazuchi, the scion of an assassin sect. Ren Nikaido's uncanny move against Setsuna Kiryu backfires.

episodes.title: The Devil Lance
episodes.plot: Lihito's hot-headed and arrogant, but Motor Head Motors' Gensai Kuroki isn't fazed by his taunts. It's youth versus age and the Kaiwan style.

episodes.title: Oddities
episodes.plot: Sen Hatsumi faces Takayuki Chiba, mimicker of other fighters' moves. Hajime Hanafusa enters the ring with orders to kill death row inmate Yohei Bando.

episodes.title: Volition
episodes.plot: Thai boxer Gaolang Wongsawat fights for his country and his sworn liege. Suekichi Kaneda's clearly outmatched, but he's got a cunning and unshakable will.

episodes.title: Champions
episodes.plot: Naoya Ohkubo is known as the King of Combat, but crowd favorite Agito Kanoh is undefeated with 157 straight wins. It's a matchup for the ages.

episodes.title: The Abyss
episodes.plot: The second round begins. At a huge size disadvantage, Cosmo Imai discards his signature grappling moves when facing the monolithic Seishu Akoya.

episodes.title: Deathmatch
episodes.plot: Seishu Akoya lives by his own code of sadistic justice. On the brink of death, Cosmo Imai has a revelation that puts him back in the fight.

episodes.title: The Devil
episodes.plot: As Ohma faces Raian of the Kure clan, other Kure assassins are on the move outside the ring. The life of Yamashita's eldest son hangs in the balance.

episodes.title: Father
episodes.plot: Just when the match seems over, Ohma has a vision and unlocks a new level of his abilities for an epic showdown against Raian.

episodes.title: Kengan
episodes.plot: Salaryman Kazuo Yamashita is unexpectedly summoned by the Chairman of Nogi Group, which leads to a new assignment in the underground world of Kengan Association.

episodes.title: Super Human
episodes.plot: Salaryman Kazuo Yamashita is unexpectedly summoned by the Chairman of Nogi Group for a new assignment with Tokita Ohma in the underground world of Kengan Association.

episodes.title: Tough Guy
episodes.plot: Ohma Tokita is battle tested and faces a bigger threat in his next fight in the kengan matches, in the form of a highly skilled pro wrestler.

episodes.title: Reunited
episodes.plot: Chairman Nogi declines Ohma's representation in the upcoming "Kengan Annihilation Tournament" but suggest a roundabout route to enter the Tournament with the assistance of Yamashita.

episodes.title: Brawl
episodes.plot: After the immediate Qualification of 28 Fighters, The remaining 100+ Fighters including Tokito Ohma are locked in a room to fight it out for the remaining 5 spots.

episodes.title: Pulling Strings
episodes.plot: Backstage Strategies, Sabotage and Scuffles commence in the Luxury Liner following an open ended Announcement from Kengan Association Chairman Katahara Metsudo.

episodes.title: The Night Before
episodes.plot: The Luxury Liner arrives at "Ganryu Island". The corporate Presidents generate 9 digit numbers on a machine to decide the Brackets and Pairings of the Tournament Fights.

episodes.title: The Battle Begins
episodes.plot: The First Match of "Kengan Annihilation Tornament" pits Jujitsu Prodigy Imai Cosmo against American Heavyweight Goon Adam Dudley.

episodes.title: Justice
episodes.plot: With his Humongous Mass and Freakish agility, Depraved Himalayan Warrior Kono Haruo Fights against Riot Squad Captain Akoya Seishu, who stands steadfast with his impenetrable defense and an underlying desire to execute "Justice".

episodes.title: Sister
episodes.plot: The Malicious Assassin Raian Kure from the Infamous Kure Clan Battles against "Baritsu" practitioner Mokichi Robinson, who is being watched by his worrying sister Elena.

episodes.title: Ashura
episodes.plot: Ohma Tokita makes his debut in his first round of the Kengan Annihilation tournament against an agile and unorthodox opponent. Setting the stage for what dangerous opponents Ohma Tokita may face if he advances.

episodes.title: Father and Son
episodes.plot: Toyo Corp continues it's intimidation and rule bending behind the scenes. Ohma has flashbacks of his Father Figure Niko. Battle between Mercenary Muteba Gizenga and Psychotic Meguro Masaki comes to an end.
